Profesional Profile

Brian Perez Lopez

I am a software engineer with experience developing web applications and RESTful services with asp.net api and Vue.js. I am passionate about creating innovative, scalable, high-quality solutions that meet user needs and business objectives. I have extensive knowledge of software design principles and patterns, as well as coding, testing, and documentation best practices. I characterize myself as an independent and self-managed professional, who plans, organizes and executes his projects with efficiency and responsibility. At the same time, I easily integrate into work teams, using GitHub as a collaboration, version control and code review tool. I like that my coworkers see in me a friend they can count on for whatever they need, we are here to help each other.

I would like to learn more about .Net, a software development framework that offers multiple advantages and opportunities. I feel good with my coworkers, because I believe that teamwork is essential to achieve objectives and improve the organizational climate. I look for innovative challenges that allow me to get out of my comfort zone and test my creativity and problem-solving ability. I love traveling, because it allows me to get to know other cultures, places and people, and broaden my horizons. My goal is to be happy, enjoying what I do and what I have, and contributing value to society.

Work Experience

Salas Transportation Inc - New York, United States Of America

Fullstack Developer in Fleet System May 2023 - July 2023:

  • 1. Visual interface design
  • 2. Implementation of the web client using Vue.js
  • 3. Consuming services offered by the project backend
  • 4. Management of vehicle files under the regulations of the United States Department of Transportation
  • 5. Creation of engineering artifacts for the implementation of business logic
  • 6. Database design and use of EntityFramework code first
  • 7. Using Json web Token as a security scheme on the server side
  • 8. Monitoring of repairs, oil changes and other operations on the vehicle
